author: retke (El Laggron)
description: Speak as if you are the bot.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users, but chat messages may be sent to OpenAI to generate responses. Please refer to: <https://openai.com/policies/privacy-policy>. Images, if enabled for scanning, may be sent to ai-horde. Please refer to: <https://stablehorde.net/privacy>
